channel.title: Awesome Melodic dubstep build up, drop (wip, need help)
channel.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/cEoBwsIDYUqNGqJFxtjtqA==
Hi, I've just made a melodic dubstep project but i ran out ideas, needed a dubstep expert to boost this one up. Can wait to hear some of your amazing ideas!!! Have fun creative :slight_smile: Edit: also please donâ€™t share the ID to everybody else this is not for free use. I share this because i need someone help to boost the song, not letting people steal it thanks you

item.title: Awesome Melodic dubstep build up, drop (wip, need help)
item.dc:creator: endercoremusic
item.description:
@OIL It very good but I think when the drop hits the growl and the saw need to separate if you put together it sounds messy but great job ^^

Read full topic
item.source: Awesome Melodic dubstep build up, drop (wip, need help)

item.title: Awesome Melodic dubstep build up, drop (wip, need help)
item.dc:creator: OIL
item.description:
My subscription ended a while ago, but I liked it so much that I decided to at the very least try make something somewhat drop-like. Luckily, you already made all the pieces, and I just had to fit them together.

https://app.auxy.co/projects/x3z3M0EgiHk2tkqbnmU2TQ==

The transitions need some reverb to make them gel better, the intro needs another bar of lead-up and the first drop needs some extra oomph (think of adding a nice growly bass), but dude? This seriously slaps and Iâ€™m glad I got to even do a little bit of work on it.

Keep truckin

Read full topic

item.title: Awesome Melodic dubstep build up, drop (wip, need help)
item.dc:creator: endercoremusic
item.description:
@AuxyYungproducer1 Itâ€™s cool but (IMO) the outro is kinda repetitive and doesnâ€™t fit and the song is not in harmonic minor. I want this sound like melodic, ambient-ish kind of dubstep. The second drop that I made is just a demo not a part of the song. Because it weird so I just put it there. And the most important part is the first drop and build-up. The song hasnâ€™t been organized yet so if you make an outro rn it doesnâ€™t match the whole track and it messy. But thank you participate in my project! Hope you learn something from this. I suggest watching YouTube tutorials, they will help you a lot ^^

Read full topic
